about_the_game:
Unlock the full potential of the game instantly with this exclusive DLC! Are you eager to dive into all the exciting content without waiting? This DLC is perfect for those who are curious and want to experience everything the game has to offer right away.

By purchasing this DLC, you'll save valuable time and skip straight to the heart of the action. No need to go through the gameplay to unlock content, everything will be available from the start.

This new Scene, called "Choose Girl" easily allows you to choose who you want to meet in some of the private rooms available in the game.

All characters, events, and secrets in the game will be fully unlocked, giving you unrestricted access to every feature and detail.

This is your chance to enjoy the game to its fullest, without any delays. If you're the type who loves instant gratification and wants to explore every corner of the game immediately, this DLC is for you. Enjoy the ultimate gaming experience now!

- Unlock all 17 girls INSTANTLY: Meet every character right away and explore their unique stories and interactions without any wait.

- UNLOCK all animations: Get full access to every animation in the game, from casual interactions to the most intimate moments.

- UNLOCK all dress types for all girls: Customize each girl with a variety of outfits, including clothes, pajamas, bikinis, and even the option for them to be naked.

- ALL INSTANTLY: Everything is at your fingertips from the moment you start the game, giving you complete control and freedom to explore.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back, of several women characters and one male character, all of legal age of majority. 

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model. The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.


There is nothing forced in the game. All situations and models were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.


In Hentai Secrets you will be able to talk to the characters, engave in conversations, seduce them and have a private session in a room.


It is possible to see in detail the woman's facial expressions and erogenous zones, including her genitalia. 
There is a male in the scene as well, and you also can see his genitalia in detail.

You must be legal age of majority or over to play Hentai Secrets.
